about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Alex, a graduate with a 2-year degree in cybersecurity, computer science and networks. Curious, serious and always motivated by technical challenges, I'm passionate about all things related to IT. I started by building my own computer, then explored development, networks, cybersecurity and much more until I found what I love: understanding, building and experimenting.
about.paragraph2: Thanks to my internships and personal investment, I've been able to work in a wide variety of fields such as web conception, virtualization and server management. Today, I'm continuing my studies by preparing to enter engineering school at JUNIA ISEN on a sandwich course, with the desire to contribute to concrete, useful and well-thought-out projects.
about.paragraph3: Outside of all that, I spend my free time in model making (especially FPV drones), working on electronics or building the PCs of my friends.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm currently looking for a work-study placement to join an engineering school, and would be delighted to talk to you. Whether it's for an opportunity, a question or just a chat, don't hesitate to contact me!

smartHotelApi.title: Smart Hotel - API
smartHotelApi.description: A RESTful API designed as part of a final-year project to manage bar orders and sensors in a connected hotel. This backend feeds both the mobile application and the web application of the Smart Hotel project.

smartHotelMobileApp.title: Smart Hotel - Mobile App
smartHotelMobileApp.description: Mobile application that enables customers to place orders and employees to manage them. The application interacts with an external API to retrieve and send data.

smartHotelWebApp.title: Smart Hotel - Web App
smartHotelWebApp.description: Web application designed to manage bar orders and sensor data in a connected hotel. It provides an intuitive browser-based interface for employees, interacting with an external API.

ttgoLora32.title: TTGO LoRa32
ttgoLora32.description: Prototype for sending messages via the LoRaWAN protocol using the LoRa32 card. This project explores the basics of long-range, low-power communication in the IoT context.

serverRoomMonitoring.title: Server Room Monitoring
serverRoomMonitoring.description: End-of-first-year project for a two-year degree to develop an environmental monitoring system for a server room. The application collects, stores and displays temperature and humidity data.
